item.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Trigger_ResourceUse
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Trigger_ResourceUse Service Datatype Description A trigger that will only execute only when all guests on the group (both static and member) satisfy certain resource watches. Methods createObject Create a resource-use policy trigger. deleteObject Delete this trigger. editObject Edit this trigger. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Trigger_ResourceUse record. getScalePolicy Retrieve the policy this trigger is on. getType Retrieve the type of trigger.

item.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Trigger_ResourceUse
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Trigger_ResourceUse Service Datatype Description Local createDate When this trigger was created. Type: dateTime deleteFlag When set and true any edit that happens on this object, be it calling edit on this directly or setting as a child while editing a parent object, will end up being a deletion. Type: boolean id A trigger's internal identifier. Type: integer
